recipe.name: Pie Crust
recipe.ingredients:
Makes enough for 1 single-crust 8- or 9-inch pie crust
170 grams all purpose flour 1 tablespoon sugar 1/2 teaspoon salt 113 grams butter (1/4 pound), cut in 4 chunks 4 tablespoons ice-cold water

step.describe: Place flour, sugar, and salt in the bowl.
Add the second half of the butter

Have the water ready and cup removed from the center of the lid.
Add the water while the machine is running
Transfer the dough to a plastic zip-top bag. Flatten it into a cohesive disk. Refrigerate for at least 20 minutes or up to 2 days before using.
